data.name: Redout 2 - Season Pass
data.detailed_description:
Enhance your Redout 2 experience with the Season Pass, which immediately unlocks the Veloce Livery and grants access to our first two upcoming DLCs upon release!

DLCs will include:

- Brand-new locations in the Redout franchise to race in
- New Career events to test your skills
- Additional rewards and customization modules to show off your style
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Enhance your Redout 2 experience with the Season Pass, which immediately unlocks the Veloce Livery and grants access to our first two upcoming DLCs upon release!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 4 GB | AMD Radeon RX 570 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 6 GB | AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
